Entries.movieTheater: @, have you heard? We've got a movie theater now! Think I'll take Caroline out on a date...
Entries.winter_7{{YearRemainder}}: Gotta start stocking Winter Star gifts soon. It's the busiest retail season of the year...$h

Entries.6_2: My father? He really wasn't ever in my life.$s#$b#It was just me, my mother, and my sister, in a tiny apartment in Zuzu City.
Entries.17_2: I grew up poor. I wouldn't ever want that for my family.$s#$b#Caroline thinks I work too much, but we need to keep the store running.
Entries.19_2: We used to have a lot more farmers down in the valley. Unfortunately, our soil isn't the best.#$b#Say, could I interest you in one of my fertilizers?
Entries.21_2: Got a good deal on rent in our place. Helps that this town's pretty small.$h#$b#That does mean I don't get many customers, though.

Entries.3_2: Everything's harder when the economy goes bad like this.#$b#Government'll bail out the big guys and there's welfare payments for the poor, but people like me get squeezed.
Entries.5_2: My suppliers want to raise their prices...#$b#I can't pass on price increases though...
Entries.7_2: Before I moved to Pelican Town? I was a night manager at a gas station in Zuzu City.#$e#Dangerous work, and definitely a young man's job.#$b#I hated having to work nights. It takes more out of you than what most people expect.$s
